meaningMnemonic: If a <radical>tsunami</radical> is going to last an <radical>eternity</radical> you better learn how to <kanji>swim</kanji> now. We'll be under water for the rest of time and if you can't swim you're not gonna make it.
readingMnemonic: <reading>Oy</reading> (およ)! Oy, stop daydreaming about <kanji>swim</kanji>ming and actually do it!
